values.value: SELECT Id, Name, EBH_DealTitle__c, EBH_OpenSeatsAvailable__c, EBH_Country__c, EBH_AcceptProposalsStart__c, EBH_AcceptProposalsEnd__c, EBH_DealSlotDisabled__c, EBH_Date__c, EPH_EndDate__c FROM EBH_DealRetailCampaign__c WHERE EBH_Country__c =:siteNumber AND RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Deal_Campaign_V1' AND EBH_DealSlotDisabled__c= false AND EBH_AcceptProposalsStart__c <= TODAY AND EBH_AcceptProposalsEnd__c >= TODAY AND EBH_OpenSeatsAvailable__c > 0
